actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize a feasibility study of the West River Diversion Unit, Pick-Sloan Missouri Basin program in North Dakota and South Dakota.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to engage in feasibility studies of the potential water resource development designated as the West River diversion unit, Pick-Sloan Missouri Basin program, in western North Dakota and South Dakota. Provides for cooperation with appropriate Satee agencies.

titles.title: A bill to authorize a feasibility study of the West River Diversion Unit, Pick-Sloan Missouri Basin program in North Dakota and South Dakota.
